About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I am a skilled full stack web developer with 2 years of experience. My expertise includes SQL Server and query optimization, server deployment on platforms like cPanel and Azure, and proficiency in WordPress using Elementor Pro. I am proficient in frontend technologies such as JavaScript , Angular, CSS, HTML, and Sass, as well as backend technologies like C#, Web API. I have a strong foundation in creating dynamic and responsive web applications.

ReelTeck

Full Stack Developer

I worked as a Full Stack Developer at ReelTeck, where I contributed to the development of their web application. My responsibilities included collaborating with the team to design and implement new features, optimizing database queries for improved performance, and ensuring the application was responsive and user-friendly. I also utilized C# Web API to build robust and scalable backend services, enabling seamless communication between the frontend and the database. This involved designing and implementing RESTful endpoints, handling data validation and authentication, and integrating with third-party APIs for enhanced functionality. It was an exciting opportunity that allowed me to leverage my skills in both frontend and backend development, delivering a comprehensive and high-quality web application.

FreeLancer

Front End Developer

As a freelance Front End Developer, I had the opportunity to work on various projects and create websites for different clients. Leveraging my expertise in frontend technologies such as JavaScript, Angular, CSS, HTML, and Sass, I designed and developed responsive and visually appealing websites that met the clients' requirements. I collaborated closely with clients to understand their needs, implemented custom designs, and optimized the websites for performance and user experience. It was a rewarding experience that allowed me to showcase my creativity and technical skills in delivering high-quality websites.
